name: ledger-sync
description: Production-ready data ingestion and reconciliation engine with modern web interface

scripts.backend: cd backend && set PYTHONPATH=%CD%\src&&python -m uvicorn ledger_sync.api.main:app --reload
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run install:backend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && set PYTHONPATH=%CD%\src&&python -m uvicorn ledger_sync.api.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && python -m black src/ tests/ && python -m ruff check --fix src/ tests/

author: Sagar Gupta
